profile_setup_headertext: Please enter campaign profile details. You can choose to have individual, (yourself as a person) or your business organization be displayed under campaign profile.
profile_setup_headertext2: Once done please click either the 'Save Changes' button to save your changes or the 'Next Step' button to save your changes and continue.
profile_setup_avtar_disclaimer: Your logo, photo or avatar image.
profile_setup_imagetype: JPEG, PNG, GIF or BMP - 50MB file limit.
profile_setup_biographytext: Do not worry if you cannot think of anything to say you can change your bio later on.
profile_setup_linkstext: Add social links to your profile. You can have a maximum of 5 links.
profile_setup_company_setup_disclaimer: Enter your company name and description.
profile_setup_organization_description_n: Provide a small description about the company
get_started_profiletype_note: You can modify your current profile or add a business organization profile for your company.
profile_setup_toggle_view_on_campaign_no: Enable this for more options to control the display of the individual and business organization profile.
profile_setup_toggle_view_on_campaign_bo: Show Both Individual User and Business Organization Profile on Campaign
profile_setup_toggle_view_on_campaign_bu: Only Show Business Organization Profile on Campaign
profile_setup_toggle_view_on_campaign_us: Only Show Individual User Profile on Campaign
profile_setup_toggle_view_on_campaign_bo: Individual and Business Organization Profile Displayed
profile_setup_name_terms_and_conditions: You also agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
profile_setup_address_terms_and_conditio: By consenting you are giving permission for us to process your details through the Stripe payment processing platform
